Primary Contact: Teresa Murray, Area Director, Central Clubs

Service Details: - Provides a safe, supportive place where children and youth can experience new opportunities, overcome barriers, build positive relationships and develop confidence and skills for life- Offers afterschool and evening programs and services for children and youth 5-18 years designed to meet the diverse needs of children and their families- Afterschool care, recreation and teen life skillsProgram Locations:- Kelowna:  Martin Avenue Community Centre, 250.762.3914- Lake Country:  Lake Country Boys and Girls Clubs, 250.766.5277- Peachland:  Peachland Boys and Girls Clubs,  250.767.2515- Rutland:  Rutland Boys and Girls Clubs, 250.765.3345- West Kelowna:  Webber Road Community Centre, 250.768.3049
How to Apply: Referal required from the Ministry of Children and Family Development
Address & Map: Administration Office1434 Graham StKelowna, BC     V1Y 3A8
Former Name: Central Okanagan Boys and Girls Club
